runs.comm: what a sharp inswinger from back of length, Rohit just about got bat on ball. Had no time to react as the ball moved off the pitch too
pretty wide now outside off and Rohit guides it to third man to get off the mark
143kph, down the leg side, Dhawan whips and doesn't connect but gets a leg bye
this ones comes in sharply too, well outside off and wide enough for Rohit to leave it
shorter and wider, not much swing now and Rohit swings and misses! Just goes over the upper edge. Good bounce and carry
more confident this time - presses forward to off and defends the length ball into the covers
angling across without much movement and Dhawan steers it between point and third man. A fumble in the deep and they do well to come back for the second
closer to the off stump, Dhawan defends towards cover point

oh beauty, that's gone right through! This one swung in unlike the first two balls but from similar length and found the wide gap between Dhawan's bat and pad as he looked to drive down the ground. Ball swings in and gets top of off stump
some movement outside off from back of length, Kohli jabs it past point for one
towards the off stump now from length, Rohit stays back and defends it back
too much width and Rohit cashes in by punching it off the back foot nicely for four. There was no movement to add to the width and Rohit jumped on that
waits for the ball to come towards off and blocks it back
room for Kohli this time and he punches it nicely too, but finds cover point
inside edge for four! It came in sharply after pitching on back of length, Kohli didn't move his feet at all and swung outside off, got an inner edge and that just missed the stumps to beat fine leg
angles it in a bit too much towards the pads and Kohli gets one towards midwicket
much fuller and wider, Rohit swishes at it and finds backward point
touch shorter outside off, Rohit drives off the back foot to the covers and the fielder throws that to concede two overthrows!
angles it across a long way, Kohli doesn't move but chases it wildly and misses. That's called a wide, harsh call
closer to the batsman now and shorter, Kohli hops back and defends it to point
another swing and a miss! Kohli charged down this time and swung wildly, doesn't connect
that's the cutter - slightly slower outside off from back of length, has the extra bounce and Kohli stays deep to defend it
short and towards the ribs, he manages to tuck it away behind square on the leg side for two. Made him a little uncomfortable there, the bounce
125kph, dances down and drives big but misses again as the ball moves away with some swing and the angle too
little bit of room, not much, and Kohli steers it to point
pulls him first ball, it's a top-edge and it goes very high but lands safely. Was coming in a bit and Rohit pulled a bit awkwardly, but deep midwicket couldn't get under it in time
much fuller now, he drives it down nicely to mid-off for one

mistimes it to mid-off, the captain has struck and the ground as erupted like a volcano! It was pitched up, Kohli looked to clear mid-off with less than two overs left for Powerplay but didn't get the middle at all. Easy catch!
pitched up outside off, Raina reaches out and drives it elegantly towards mid-off
extra bounce beats Raina! It was shorter outside off with the angle, Raina didn't move his feet this time and poked and missed
little too wide outside off and Raina makes some room to steer it to third man for one
short ball to Raina and he defends it back off the back foot
just wide of short cover! Raina made room and drove the ball well away from his body into the off side, just to the right of a diving short cover and gets four
patiently defends the length ball back to the bowler from around the off stump
another swing and a miss! Clears his front foot to drive that uppishly on the off side, misses it completely
clears his front foot again and gets a poor delivery this time, short and wide, and Raina cuts it fiercely past backward point for four!
unnecessary heave on the leg side and that wasn't far from the leg side! Pitched just outside leg and came towards the batsman who moved to the leg side to slog on the leg side but couldn't connect
angling into the batsman, Rohit waits and defends it back
bit more towards the leg side and it's tucked to deep backward square easily
back of length well outside off, punches it towards deep point for one
slowish bouncer at 129kph, it's too short as Raina lets it go and called a wide
makes room and comes out of the crease, Raina drives the angling away delivery inside out wide of third man and Mustafiz does well to keep it to two
slowish offcutter on leg at 120kph, jabbed to midwicket for one
bit of a mix up but no run out! Little short and wide outside off, he helps it to third man and Raina quickly turns around for the second but is sent back in time
bit short just outside off, Rohit mistimes the pull to midwicket
tucks this one softly wide of midwicket for one
slow through the air towards off and Raina punches it into the covers for one
tossed up outside off, driven down firmly to long-on

middle stump gone! Mahmudullah bowled it pretty slow again from round the wicket, Raina came well out of the crease to drive down the ground but got nowhere close to the ball that came in instead of turning away and snuck through the bat-pad gap!
he's off the mark straightaway by pushing the length delivery softly into the covers
turns it in nicely and Yuvraj waits before edging it late past the keeper. Looked slightly intentional
outside off and pushed into the covers
coming in with the angle and he chops it to point
slower outside off, Rohit stays back and turns it towards long-on for one
keeps his bat close to the pad and defends the turning ball late towards point
fuller on middle and Rohit flicks it away easily to deep midwicket
shuffles down and wrists it down to long on with the turn
floats it towards the middle stump, Yuvi defends it back carefully
coming in with the angle again, jabs it to leg for one
short and flat towards middle stump, he makes room and slams it to long off
gets some room outside off, punches it into the off side
shuffles down again, he pitches it shorter and Rohit works it to long on
lot of width outside off, he swings and misses
almost a replay, there's room, there's a bat in Rohit's hand which he swings but misses again
dropped! That went straight to Shakib at point after Rohit timed it very well, cut it straight to Shakib but he put it down
four now - beautiful placement! There was room and some pace, he just waited for it and helped it between point and third man in the gap
even more room and that's gone all the way! Lot of width outside off, short ball and Rohit times it with an upper cut to send it flying over deep backward point

another boundary, this time with a misfield! Slightly closer to the off stump, still there was room and Rohit played it fine delicately. The third man fielder got there with a slide but it went through his legs
shortish towards middle, worked away to midwicket for one
126kph, full and slightly wide, Rohit drives that nicely to sweeper cover and they come back for the second. Good running
angles the short ball in and Rohit knows that fine leg is in. Puts his weight on the back foot and pulls it late enough to beat the fielder in the circle
angling in again, nudges it down towards long on
short ball outside off, he pulls it but not from the middle to deep midwicket
angling in a bit and it's worked away to deep midwicket
keeps a bit low as Shakib brings it in from round the wicket, Rohit drives into the covers
shuffles down and towards off, takes it on the pad before it goes towards short third man
makes some room and drives that nicely to long off
tries an uncharacteristic reverse sweep and misses
goes hard with a slog sweep but doesn't middle it. Single to deep midwicket
full on off stump, flicks it with the angle to leg
starts outside off and Rohit steers the ball to third man
rolls his fingers over that one but it's too full and Yuvraj drives that down handsomely on the off side, mid-off slides and should have stopped it but it went past him
cuts it in from outside off, Yuvraj also cuts it on the off side
extra bounce around the off stump, makes Rohit hop on his toes and he helps it to third man again
slightly slow with some room, no movement and Yuvraj chops it easily to third man
chipped towards mid-on but falls short! Slower delivery was pitched up, Rohit was early into the shot and chipped it down the ground but mid-on could not have done anything about it
too slow through the air, Rohit charges down and slams it to long-off. That's his ffity and such a crucial innings it has been
room outside off, cuts it square on off for one
full on middle, it was slow enough for Rohit to go down on a knee and sweep that with some power to the midwicket boundary, between two fielders
comes down and across, Shakib pitches it slow and gets an inside edge to the pad before it goes to leg

Yuvraj finally connects, but it's straight to deep midwicket! Yuvraj went with the spin like he usually does against left-arm spinners and smacked it nicely but needed more power to go over the fielder. Sarkar was a few yards inside the boundary and caught it easily
presents the straight bat to push it to cover
short of length outside off, slices it to deep point
outside the off stump, pushed into the covers
slower and fuller outside off, there's not much pace so the drive takes some time to reach long-off and they make it back for two
just clears long-off! He came down the track, lofted it straight down the ground and Shakib was getting ready. He jumped too but it went just over him
short ball, it's a mis-hit off a pull but it lands between long-on and deep midwicket for four more!
what a classic drive! Made some room, got a full delivery and caressed it all along the ground for a beautiful drive
gets a bit of width, chops it with hard hands and does well to place that right in the gap behind square on the off side for four!
touch fuller and it's pushed down to long off

that's gone high again, that's Shakib under the ball again and it's six again, just out of his reach! It was a short ball, Rohit opened up and flick-pulled it very high into the sky. Shakib fancied his chances again, got his hands too, stretching them over the boundary but it had the distance
comes down to smack it, gets an inside edge towards mid on
hard hands for the length delivery, goes high towards third man but it falls short and he misjudges it a bit for them to come back for the second
short ball down the leg side for a wide

don't pitch it up to him! He might have rolled his fingers over that one, the boundary might have been pushed in for T20s, but Pandya connects and packs such power into that that it lands into the crowd over the midwicket boundary
full delivery with width and it's driven into the covers in the gap for two
slower legcutter well outside off, slices it to short third man for one
there's only some room, not much, and Pandya bludgeons that with such a follow through that it reaches the point boundary in no time
attempted yorker is a low full toss, he flicks it by stooping a bit and that's also beat the deep midwicket fielder
slower bouncer, Pandya makes room early and tries to scoop it over the keeper but misses

excellent running from Rohit! Pandya slogged that to deep midwicket and wasn't that far from the fielder. The throw was at Rohit's end for the second and he ran back, put in a dive too to make it in time
short of length towards middle and leg, mistimes a pull towards midwicket
brute force from Pandya! He gets into position early by opening up, gets one outside off and throws his hands at it to send that flying to the third man boundary
Pandya makes room, Mustafiz pitches it full and wide outside off, well bowled as Pandya chases and misses
wild swing for another delivery well outside off, he misses again!
stays close to the off stump this time and drills that straight down to long-off. Rohit comes back for the second
misses the full and wide delivery again and now they scamper for the bye. Mushfiqur has a shy at the stumps and misses so Pandya retains strike
full on middle, slogged down to long on

superb catch by Soumya Sarkar in the deep! It was a short of length slower ball outside off, Rohit went for the heave and middled it too, but Sarkar was in the deep and ran to his left, went low and got both his hands under the ball nicely with a forward dive to take that!
angles it nicely into Pandya who slogs and misses as the ball goes through his legs. No time for a bye either
straight down long-on's throat! Pandya gets a full delivery, hammers it down the ground and finds Mahmudullah who was a few yards inside the boundary
almost in the block hole outside off, Dhoni rocks on the back foot and drills it down just past the umpire. Mid-off dives to his left to save two
that's gone into the Grand Stand! Pitched short, Dhoni pivots on the back foot and cracks that with a pull to the midwicket boundary with great timing!
